import React from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Form, Spinner } from 'react-bootstrap' import ChatContent from './components/ChatContent/ChatContent' import useChat from './logic/useChat' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' const Chat = () => { const { state } = useLocation(); const { authenticatedUser : user } = useContext(AppAuthContext) const { isLoading, error, messages, handleSend, setMsg, msgLoading, msgError, msg} = useChat(state.id , user) return (

{state.name}

setMsg(e.target.value)} />
) } export default Chat
